RT [@VestaDAO](https://twitter.com/VestaDAO): why is vMARKET gud??

1. degens on vMARKET have the option to use a social login to create a new wallet
-Gmail, Twitter/X, Telegram, Discord, Farcaster, or even your phone number!

2. low fees bro.
-Wager with only 1% fees on all predictions (only on winnings). [0% fees right now during testing!]

3. community built - home grown
-We are using a voting system to implement features, where to direct platform fees, etc...

4. did we mention home grown?
-The Vesta team is not some grant farming, foundation scamming, suckers like 90% of projects in Web3.

5. cheap as fuk
- vMARKET is on [@MetisL2](https://twitter.com/MetisL2) which has less than 1 penny gas fees (heard they will be even cheaper soon??)
